entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
